body_text: I wonder if we should always pass Immutable objects to nested components, and then handle the toJS within the component where it needs it (e.g. in its render).
body: I wonder if we should always pass Immutable objects to nested components, and then handle the `toJS` within the component where it needs it (e.g. in its `render`).
body_html: I wonder if we should always pass Immutable objects to nested components, and then handle the toJS within the component where it needs it (e.g. in its render).
